title: The 19th of March Türkiye Protests
main: The authoritarian Erdoganist regime in Türkiye has arrested the mayor of İstanbul, Ekrem İmamoğlu, on the 19th of May 2025. İmamoğlu is a highly popular politician of the mainline opposition party CHP and was their expected presidential candidate.

claims.title: The Opposition Party has won the local elections
claims.description: CHP and other opposition parties secured more votes than AKP in the 2024 mayoral elections, enabling CHP to push for early elections with İmamoğlu as their candidate. AKP is planning to present Erdogan as their candidate, which is against the Turkish Constitution.

claims.title: İmamoğlu Arrested
claims.description: Turkish police detained İmamoğlu on charges of aiding terrorist groups and unlawful use of city resources. The government has not been able to provide any proof or witnesses other than 'secret witness testimonies'

sources.text: The inequal application of law by AKP

claims.title: Government Sides With Terrorists
claims.description: The AKP has begun cooperating with the Kurdish-backed DEM Party and PKK leader Öcalan, undermining their stance against İmamoğlu and betraying the memory of thousands of civilians killed by PKK. As they prepare to pardon PKK's leader in a bid to strengthen their position amongst kurdish voters. The government backed police and prosecutors have shown heavyhanded responses to the anti-Erdoganist protestors, while defending and supporting PKK militants in DEM Party rallies
